video.title: Raising Hope
video.synopsis: Jimmy suddenly finds himself a father after a one-night stand with a murderer, but his eccentric family pitches in to help with the new arrival.

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy Chance has a one-night stand with a wanted felon, and eight months later he ends up a father. Jimmy asks his parents for help in raising Hope.
episodes.title: Pilot

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy is in search of a day care center for Hope, and asks a former fling for help. Later, Jimmy asks Virginia to quit smoking for Hope's sake.
episodes.title: Dead Tooth

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy has to baby-proof the house after teaching Hope how to crawl. Jimmy finds out that Virginia is a hoarder whose dream is to win the lottery.
episodes.title: Dream Hoarders

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina discovers the story behind the horrible pictures in the house. But there is one good photo -- from a traffic cam as they ran a red light.
episodes.title: Say Cheese

episodes.synopsis: When Sabrina's boyfriend can't make it to the deli guy's Halloween party, Jimmy offers to put on his costume and go in his place.
episodes.title: Happy Halloween

episodes.synopsis: Lucy leaves a videotape for Hope after she's put to death by electric chair. Jimmy finds out that his parents had been keeping secrets from him.
episodes.title: Family Secrets

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy realizes his family has no health insurance when Hope gets sick. Jimmy takes a job as a bag boy in the same grocery store where Sabrina works.
episodes.title: The Sniffles

episodes.synopsis: Trying to get a day care scholarship for Hope isn't as easy as Jimmy thought, and everyone who tries to help ends up in court for committing a crime.
episodes.title: Blue Dots

episodes.synopsis: The Chances invite Lucy's parents over for Thanksgiving dinner, who help themselves to turkey, stuffing, cranberries and little baby Hope.
episodes.title: Meet the Grandparents

episodes.synopsis: When Jimmy learns that Burt gave up his dream of being a rock star to raise him, Jimmy gets his musical hero, Smokey Floyd, to play at the store.
episodes.title: Burt Rocks

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy discovers his father always sold the most wanted toy during Christmas for profit. Virginia wants everyone to be part of a nativity scene.
episodes.title: Toy Story

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy becomes friends with Justin, another single dad, and they set up a play date with Hope and Justin's baby, much to Virginia's dismay.
episodes.title: Romeo and Romeo

episodes.synopsis: The Chance family is obsessed with cleanliness, and Maw Maw moves into the greenhouse. The family's health secrets are revealed from old home movies.
episodes.title: A Germ of a Story

episodes.synopsis: Virginia's cousin Delilah visits the Chance family, wanting her share of Maw Maw's estate, and admits that she still has a crush on Burt.
episodes.title: What Up, Cuz?

episodes.synopsis: There's a standoff between Virginia and Sabrina when they learn each other's secrets. The family thinks that Burt should get a vasectomy.
episodes.title: Snip-Snip

episodes.synopsis: Cousin Mike returns -- with his new wife, Tanya, and the cult that they joined. Virginia tries to stop Jimmy from becoming a member of the cult.
episodes.title: Cultish Personality

episodes.synopsis: When Jimmy decides on guardians for Hope, the family argue over who is best suited for the job. Maw Maw thinks there are mongooses in the house.
episodes.title: Mongooses

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina thinks her college boyfriend has been cheating on her. Maw Maw meets a man at Shelly's day care and instantly falls in love with him.
episodes.title: Cheaters

episodes.synopsis: Virginia and Burt read a book on sleep training and try it out on Hope. Jimmy's new girlfriend makes Jimmy a "special" beverage with a wild kick.
episodes.title: Sleep Training

episodes.synopsis: The whole family decides to experiment with flirting. Sabrina and Jimmy compete to be Barney's favorite employee, while Virginia deals with a stalker.
episodes.title: Everyone Flirts Sometimes

episodes.synopsis: When Burt and Virginia hear their neighbor's troubling conversations over Hope's baby monitor, they do their best to save the couple's marriage.
episodes.title: Baby Monitor

episodes.synopsis: The Chances look back at when Jimmy turned 18, became a goth and lived in the grocery store, right when Maw Maw kicked everyone out of the house.
episodes.title: Don't Vote for This Episode

episodes.synopsis: When Jimmy watches a home video of himself as a 13-year-old, he discovers that he was once a musical prodigy with a promising career.
episodes.title: Prodigy

episodes.synopsis: Burt discovers that Sabrina comes from a wealthy family. Embarrassed by her upbringing, she reluctantly introduces the Chance family to her father.
episodes.title: Sabrina Has Money

episodes.synopsis: When the hippie who kidnapped Burt 20 years ago pays the Chance family a visit, they discover that Burt's disappearance wasn't all that it seemed.
episodes.title: Kidnapped

episodes.synopsis: Virginia, Burt, Jimmy and Sabrina head to Las Vegas to attend a cousin's wedding. Virginia is embarrassed that her own wedding wasn't as lavish.
episodes.title: Henderson, Nevada-Adjacent Baby

episodes.synopsis: Virginia, Burt, Jimmy, Sabrina, Maw Maw and Hope get caught in the rain while camping out on the front lawn after their house is tented for termites.
episodes.title: Killer Hope

episodes.synopsis: A 13-year-old makes a run for Sabrina, which drives Jimmy crazy. Meanwhile, Maw Maw swallows her gold tooth and Burt and Virginia plot to retrieve it.
episodes.title: Jimmy and the Kid

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy, Virginia, Burt, Sabrina, Maw Maw and Hope borrow a house to impress Burt's parents, who have decided to celebrate Thanksgiving with the family.
episodes.title: Burt's Parents

episodes.synopsis: When an invention convention comes to town, Virginia encourages the family to submit their own inventions that could bring home a large cash prize.
episodes.title: Bro-Gurt

episodes.synopsis: Burt encourages Jimmy to be more of a daredevil. So when Jimmy's co-worker invites him to a party, Jimmy jumps at the chance to unleash his bold side.
episodes.title: The Men of New Natesville

episodes.synopsis: In a nod to "It's a Wonderful Life," the Chances go to the movies and are surprised to find the film is strikingly similar to their own family life.
episodes.title: It's a Hopeful Life

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy becomes inspired to go back to school and prepare for the GED exam. But Jimmy is surprised to find his former teacher instructing the class.
episodes.title: Mrs. Smartypants

episodes.synopsis: Burt becomes obsessed with gambling when he believes he can reclaim all the items he lost when he bet away all the family's belongings many years ago.
episodes.title: Gambling Again

episodes.synopsis: Pressured by tax season, Burt hires Barney as his business manager. Caught up in the stress, Burt makes a hurtful comment about Virginia's career.
episodes.title: Tarot Cards

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy's spirits are low when Sabrina and Wyatt get serious, so Virginia and Burt convince him to create a make-believe girlfriend to make her jealous.
episodes.title: Jimmy's Fake Girlfriend

episodes.synopsis: Realizing that they've been hiding habits from each other, Jimmy and Sabrina agree to let their guards down. But Sabrina reveals an unusual phobia.
episodes.title: Sheer Madness

episodes.synopsis: When Sabrina is arrested after participating in an Occupy Natesville protest, one of the prison attendants claims to be a friend from her past.
episodes.title: Single White Female Role Model

episodes.synopsis: Hope's misbehavior has become such an issue that Virginia and Burt suggest that it might be time for Jimmy to start spanking her.
episodes.title: Spanks Butt, No Spanks

episodes.synopsis: Virginia agrees to look after a troublesome teenage girl, who says she is ready to take her relationship with her boyfriend to the next level.
episodes.title: Poking Holes in the Story

episodes.synopsis: When attention-seeking Sarah Louise runs for another term as chairperson of the Natesville church group, Burt decides to run against her.
episodes.title: Hogging All the Glory

episodes.synopsis: When Jimmy finds out Sabrina has a new attractive study partner, Virginia convinces him that they are doing more than just studying.
episodes.title: Sabrina's New Jimmy

episodes.synopsis: In a special "mockumentary" episode, Nancy Grace examines Hope's mom, serial killer Lucy. The family relays personal accounts of how Jimmy met Lucy.
episodes.title: Inside the Probe

episodes.synopsis: Following the revelations of the "Inside Probe" exposé of their family history, the Chances are put on trial in a fight to retain custody of Hope.
episodes.title: I Want My Baby Back, Baby Back, Baby Back

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina's grandmother's last will and testament, revealed in a video recorded before she died, has a big impact on Jimmy and Sabrina's relationship.
episodes.title: Not Indecent, but Not Quite a Decent Enough Proposal

episodes.synopsis: After spotting some of the tactics the Chance family employs to keep Maw Maw under control, a social worker threatens to take her away.
episodes.title: Throw Maw Maw from the House - Part 1

episodes.synopsis: The Chance family devises a ridiculously intricate plan to break Maw Maw out of a state-run nursing facility.
episodes.title: Throw Maw Maw from the House - Part 2

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy and Sabrina attend a marriage retreat before they get married. Virginia and Burt pose as a newly engaged couple so they can attend, too.
episodes.title: If a Ham Falls in the Woods..

episodes.synopsis: Sabrina asks Jimmy to hang out with her gay best friend and his partner. Jimmy asks Burt to do some recon by spending time at the local gay bar.
episodes.title: Don't Ask, Don't Tell Me What To Do

episodes.synopsis: When Jimmy finds a boyhood photo of himself with a family he doesn't know, Burt reveals that he and Virginia placed him for adoption for a short time.
episodes.title: What up, Bro?

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy is determined to sell the most candy bars around town so that Hope can ride atop Natesville's Thanksgiving Day float.
episodes.title: Candy Wars

episodes.synopsis: When the annual Angry Bowel Syndrome 1K walk comes to Natesville, the Chance family decides to support the cause that Jimmy suffered from as a child.
episodes.title: The Walk for the Runs

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy confronts Sabrina about only doing the "fun stuff" with Hope and not the heavy lifting of parenthood. She gets the chance to prove him wrong.
episodes.title: Squeak Means Squeak

episodes.synopsis: Convinced that the world is going to end on Dec. 21, 2012, Virginia forces the family to train for the apocalypse.
episodes.title: The Last Christmas

episodes.synopsis: When Jimmy and Sabrina decide to buy a new car that will be safer for Hope, they discover that Jimmy has a rock-bottom credit score.
episodes.title: Credit Where Credit is Due

episodes.synopsis: Burt tells Jimmy that he needs to buy Sabrina a nice engagement ring, so Jimmy starts volunteering for medical experiments to come up with the cash.
episodes.title: Lord of the Ring

episodes.synopsis: Frank wants to throw Jimmy a memorable bachelor party, but Jimmy resists the idea, citing the crazy things that tend to happen when he goes wild.
episodes.title: What Happens at Howdy's Doesn't Stay at Howdy's

episodes.synopsis: The wedding day is finally here and Sabrina's mom has hired the camera crew from "Modern Family" to capture the whole blessed event.
episodes.title: Modern Wedding

episodes.synopsis: The family takes a road trip to Los Angeles to attend the taping of Hope's favorite TV show.
episodes.title: Yo Zappa Do: Part 1

episodes.synopsis: When Hope is recruited as an actress on "Yo Zappa Do," Jimmy signs on as an extra to help her through her scenes.
episodes.title: Yo Zappa Do: Part 2

episodes.synopsis: When Burt and Virginia discover that their storage locker is up for auction, they also realize they've misplaced a personal, incriminating home video.
episodes.title: Sex, Clown and Videotape

episodes.synopsis: The Ghost of Arbor Day Past, Present and Future pays a visit to Sabrina after she takes a stand against the way the family celebrates the holiday.
episodes.title: Arbor Daze

episodes.synopsis: It's a "My Name Is Earl" reunion as the Chances throw a birthday party for Hope. Jason Lee reprises his guest-star role as ex-rock star Smokey Floyd.
episodes.title: Making the Band

episodes.synopsis: Virginia and Burt are shocked when Sabrina's new friend turns out to be Jimmy's ex-girlfriend who broke his heart as a teenager.
episodes.title: The Old Girl

episodes.synopsis: Burt's parents come to town with the surprising news that he's actually Jewish, prompting him to prepare for the bar mitzvah he never had.
episodes.title: Burt Mitzvah - The Musical

episodes.synopsis: It's a Mother's Day to remember as Burt and Barney take a road trip to Maw Maw's childhood home and discover that her mother may still be alive.
episodes.title: Mother's Day

episodes.synopsis: The mysterious Natesville resident that keeps showing up to offer the Chance children cookies may be more familiar than they realize.
episodes.title: Deja Vu Man

episodes.synopsis: Burt and Virginia bring a new bartering system to Natesville, and Jimmy feels inadequate after Sabrina saves him from choking.
episodes.title: Burt Bucks

episodes.synopsis: Desperate to give Hope the family vacation Jimmy never had, Sabrina arranges a boat trip for the group and learns a valuable lesson.
episodes.title: Ship Happens

episodes.synopsis: When Virginia gets glasses, she can finally see how disgusting the house is -- and it sabotages her sex life with Burt.
episodes.title: Hi-Def

episodes.synopsis: Jimmy throws a party for Sabrina after Hope's adoption becomes official, and Virginia and Burt step in for Wally when he collapses in court.
episodes.title: Adoption

episodes.synopsis: Howdy's peppy new owner Maxine plans an art show featuring Jimmy's drawings of hippos doing people things.
episodes.title: Extreme Howdy's Makeover

episodes.synopsis: Burt and Virginia pay homage to Hitchcock by spying on their new neighbors, convinced that husband Gary killed his wife.
episodes.title: Murder, She Hoped

episodes.synopsis: Burt thinks that Jimmy and Sabrina's sex life is on the rocks, so he and Virginia try to help spice things up for them.
episodes.title: Dysfunction Function

episodes.synopsis: Certain the kazoo factory pollution is killing all of Natesville's bees, Burt and Virginia go undercover; meanwhile, Sabrina stages a protest outside.
episodes.title: Bee Story

episodes.synopsis: Burt steps in for Natesville's rehabbing mayor during the holidays, but the reality of local politics makes mincemeat out of his holiday spirit.
episodes.title: The Chance Who Stole Christmas

episodes.synopsis: Maw Maw accidentally invites Virginia's rival, cousin Delilah, back to town -- triggering a battle to see which one will remain in Maw Maw's will.
episodes.title: Hey There, Delilah

episodes.synopsis: Virginia's ego is wounded when Jimmy says Sabrina's casserole is better than hers -- so both ladies and Burt's mom enter a cooking competition.
episodes.title: Hot Dish

episodes.synopsis: Maxine pays to observe Burt and Virginia's relationship because they never seem to argue -- then watches them bicker over how to spend her cash.
episodes.title: The Thrilla in Natesvilla

episodes.synopsis: The international Grocery Games arrive in Natesville, but when America's shopping athletes face a drug scandal, Burt and Virginia pick up the torch.
episodes.title: The Road to Natesville

episodes.synopsis: Burt's lying has Virginia wondering whether he's planning a big anniversary gift or gambling again, so Barney tries trapping him into confession.
episodes.title: Anniversary Ball

episodes.synopsis: Everyone's having a go at their second childhood: Burt wants to relive an old dare with Virginia in tow, and Maw Maw has the hots for an old stoner.
episodes.title: The One Where They Get High

episodes.synopsis: The "weekend retreat" Barney suggests to Burt and Virginia isn't exactly a lush vacation spot; meanwhile, Jimmy and Sabrina try to make a baby.
episodes.title: Baby Phat

episodes.synopsis: Hope's non-reaction to her pet fish's death has Sabrina and Jimmy concerned, while Virginia's boss tempts her with a promotion and a lot of partying.
episodes.title: Dinner with the Tropes

episodes.synopsis: Virginia's newfound grip on reality is shaken when "ghostly" evidence arises. Burt goes along, though it isn't the kind of restless spirit she thinks.
episodes.title: Para-Natesville Activity

episodes.synopsis: Burt and Virginia start to adopt a dog but end up with an unwelcome houseguest, and Jimmy wants Sabrina to know he's still got game with the ladies.
episodes.title: Man's Best Friend

episodes.synopsis: Burt becomes a bounty hunter when Virginia's promotion keeps her busy, and Jimmy and Sabrina figure out how to afford Nanna's former maid.
episodes.title: How I Met Your Mullet

episodes.synopsis: Virginia's dad (aka Cookie Man and Déjà Vu Man) returns with a surprise for the couple, including big wedding plans with a hidden agenda.
episodes.title: The Father Daughter Dance
